settings.title: When was BONIA established?
settings.answer: Established since 1974, BONIA the Italian inspiration, an international luxury brand and leather expert, has created a trademarked legend in the fashion industry, achieving numerous milestones among the many accolades it receives.

settings.title: Where is the head office of Shop Online BONIA.com?
settings.answer: The office of BONIA.com in Singapore is located at No 12, Harper Road, Sulisam Building, #03-00, Singapore 369677

settings.title: Are the BONIA products selling at Shop Online BONIA.com the authentic BONIA products?
settings.answer: Yes, Shop Online BONIA.com is an official e-store of BONIA.

settings.title: Where else can I buy BONIA products?
settings.answer: Besides Shop Online BONIA.com, you may find BONIA products in BONIA boutiques as well as BONIA counters throughout the world including Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Japan, Vietnam, Myanmar, Cambodia, Indonesia, Brunei, Kuwait, and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

settings.title: My BONIA item is broken. Where can I fix it?
settings.answer: Kindly send an email to our e-Customer Care Personnel at esales@bonia.com.sg for further assistance.

settings.title: How long is the warranty of each BONIA product?
settings.answer: The warranty of each BONIA product (Normal Price and 20% OFF) is 6 months only. It is advisable to keep the tax invoice together with the warranty card.

settings.title: How do I create a Shop Online BONIA.com account?
settings.answer: You may create your account by clicking Login/Sign Up at the top-right of the interface.

settings.title: I’ve forgotten my password. What should I do?
settings.answer: Go to Login/Sign Up  and click Forgot Password to retrieve your password via email.

settings.title: By registering, will I automatically receive updates on new arrivals and any ongoing sales and promotions in Shop Online BONIA.com?
settings.answer: Yes, BONIA.com is happy to keep you updated with our new arrivals and ongoing sales and promotions from time to time, via email.

settings.title: What form of payment do you accept?
settings.answer:
We only accept:

1. Credit card (Visa, MasterCard)

2. Digital Wallets (Apple Pay, Alipay)

settings.title: Is it safe to use my credit card at Shop Online BONIA.com?
settings.answer: All transactions on our website are processed using Stripe, a secure online payment gateway that encrypts your card details in a secure host environment.

settings.title: How do you ensure the quality of products?
settings.answer: We ensure every product’s quality by complying with our Quality Control Principles before proceeding with delivery.

settings.title: The colour of fashion item is different from what I've seen in person. Why?
settings.answer: Although we have made every effort to display the products and its colours as accurately as possible, the displayed colour of products will depend upon one's monitor and we cannot guarantee that one's monitor will accurately portray the actual colours of the products.

settings.title: I sent a message to Shop Online BONIA.com, but there's no response yet.
settings.answer: Our e-Customer Care Personnel shall reply your message and/or email within 1 working day. Please kindly wait patiently.
